name: biosynthesis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of producing a particular substance within a living organism: About 20 amino acids are commonly used in the biosynthesis of proteins. The enzyme is needed for androgen biosynthesis.
More examplesFewer examplesTryptophan is an amino acid involved in the biosynthesis of serotonin. The substance interferes with the biosynthesis of haemoglobin in humans.In inflammatory bowel disease, there might be increased polyunsaturated fatty acid biosynthesis.We speculate that the P polypeptide may be involved in the transport of tyrosine, the primary precursor to melanin biosynthesis.
